<section class="feature-mod" role="region" aria-label="CPA Stories & Opportunities">
	<h2 id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_h2" class="mod-title">CPA Stories &amp; Opportunities</h2>
	<div class="gridset">
        
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_0" href="/en/connecting-and-news/news/professional-news/2017/july/finance-canada-consultation"><img src="/-/media/site/operational/sc-strategic-communications/images/g10400-sc.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=7CC724FAF4FE8715278A27FCBC06CED0CC17AE43" alt="finance Canada consultation, Canada flag in front of business" width="800" height="514" /><br />
                            <h3>Finance Canada consultation on private corporations</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">August 30, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>CPA Canada will make a submission to government. If you have any comments on this issue, please share them with us. Check back here for updates on our approach and activity.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_1" href="/en/career-and-professional-development/conferences/2017/september/the-one-national-conference-2017"><img src="/-/media/site/operational/ep-education-pld/images/01286-ep-feature.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=89DE322B628395F3FAE4257384FDC79353EBB594" alt="Rideau Canal" width="800" height="514" /><br />
                            <h3>The ONE national conference 2017</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">September 18, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>Jointly presented by CPA Canada and CPA Ontario, The ONE is the must-attend, multi-track event of the year, designed for all CPAs who want to be at the top of their game.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_0_rptHighlights_hypLink_2" href="/en/connecting-and-news/news/professional-news/2017/august/making-climate-change-a-business-issue"><img src="/-/media/site/operational/sc-strategic-communications/images/01442-sc.jpg?h=514&amp;la=en&amp;w=800&amp;hash=547B20EDE46FDCE269301AEF7C79F41EF2BFE3EE" alt="earth inside a water drop on a leaf" width="800" height="514" /><br />
                            <h3>Making climate change a business issue</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">August 14, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>The business cost of climate change is real and growing. But, not everyone is aware of the issues. Are you prepared? </p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
	</div>
</section>

<section class="feature mod" role="region" aria-label="Highlights">
	<h2 id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_h2" class="mod-title">Highlights</h2>
	<div class="gridset">
        
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_0" href="/en/the-cpa-profession/about-cpa-canada/governance-of-cpa-canada/cpa-canada-board-of-directors"><br />
                            <h3>CPA Canada Board of Directors and AGM</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                    
                        <p>Learn about CPA Canada’s board of directors and the upcoming Annual General Meeting to be held in Quebec City on September 27, 2017.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_1" href="/en/connecting-and-news/blogs/cpa-stories/10-accountants-who-matter"><br />
                            <h3>10 accountants who matter</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">July 17, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>As Canada celebrates its 150th anniversary, we take a look back at 10 accountants who changed the face of our profession.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_2_rptHighlights_hypLink_2" href="/en/career-and-professional-development/conferences/2017/september/the-one-national-conference-2017"><br />
                            <h3>The ONE national conference 2017</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">September 18, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>Jointly presented by CPA Canada and CPA Ontario, The ONE is the must-attend, multi-track event of the year, designed for all CPAs who want to be at the top of their game.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
	</div>
</section>


<section class="feature-mod" role="region" aria-label="CPA News">
	<h2 id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_h2" class="mod-title">CPA News</h2>
	<div class="gridset">
        
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_0" href="/en/connecting-and-news/news/professional-news/2017/july/finance-canada-consultation"><br />
                            <h3>Finance Canada consultation on private corporations</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">August 30, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>CPA Canada will make a submission to government. If you have any comments on this issue, please share them with us. Check back here for updates on our approach and activity.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_1" href="/en/connecting-and-news/news/professional-news/2017/august/climate-change-and-business-strategy"><br />
                            <h3>Climate change and business strategy</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">August 2, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>Organizations that factor climate change into their long-term business plans are more resilient. Discover strategies to enhance sustainability in your practice and meet investor demands for greater financial transparency.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
                <article class="grid span4">
			        <div class="mod-link">
                        <a id="lockedcontent_0_maincolumn_0_homemain_3_rptHighlights_hypLink_2" href="/en/connecting-and-news/news/media-centre/2017/july/a4s-cfo-leadership-network"><br />
                            <h3>CFO Leadership Network announces three new projects</h3>			        
                        </a>
			        </div>
                    
                        <p><span class="article-date">July 28, 2017</span></p>    
                    
                    
                        <p>The recently established Canadian Chapter of The Prince's Accounting for Sustainability (A4S) CFO Leadership Network will be working on three initial projects.</p>			        
                    
		        </article>
            
	</div>
</section>
